lead_paragraph: Hillary Rodham Clinton announced a $600 million effort Wednesday to enroll girls in secondary schools around the globe, aiming to address security and access problems in the developing world.

headline.main: Hillary Clinton Pushes School Program for Girls
headline.print_headline: Hillary Clinton Pushes School Program for Girls

snippet: Hillary Rodham Clinton announced a $600 million effort Wednesday to enroll girls in secondary schools around the globe, aiming to address security and access problems in the developing world....
